summary: Diff implements a multi-page responsive marketing site with routing, shared header/footer, industrial Tailwind theme, and a contact form that submits inquiries to a Motoko backend with stable storage and list API. However, the generated image asset commits required by REQ-6 are not evidenced in the provided diff summary, and several unrequested backend auth/profile/access-control features were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static brand and homepage imagery under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo + homepage hero/section visuals).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references generated assets (logo and hero) via /assets/generated paths, but the diff summary does not show any files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor does it provide evidence of an additional generated visual element being used on the home page beyond the hero image. Omitted files may include these assets, but this cannot be confirmed from the provided summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access control system with admin/user permissions and secret-token initialization hook (_initializeAccessControlWithSecret), plus authorization mixins.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for admin gating, secret tokens, or any access-control framework; it only requires inquiry create/list APIs and explicitly notes customer login/portal is a non-goal (auth not required).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management APIs (save/get user profiles) in the backend.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request user profiles or any user account features; customer login/portal is explicitly a non-goal.
evidence: backend/main.mo (UserProfile type and get/save profile methods)

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration and provider on the frontend.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication is not required for this request; while Internet Identity is the only allowed option if auth is ever needed, adding it is not requested and introduces extra behavior/complexity.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (uses identity to create authenticated actor)
